sentences.en: He did not fully appreciate the significance of signing the contract.
sentences.cn: 他没有完全理解签署这份合同的意义。

sentences.en: He didn't appreciate the comedy of the situation.
sentences.cn: 他未领略到这种局面的滑稽可笑之处。

sentences.en: Her abilities are not fully appreciated by her employer.
sentences.cn: 她的才干没有得到雇主的充分赏识。

sentences.en: I appreciate your concern , but honestly, I’m fine.
sentences.cn: 谢谢你关心，不过说真的，我很好。

sentences.en: I can't tell you how much I appreciate your thoughtfulness.
sentences.cn: 非常感谢您的体贴入微，我真的无以言表。

sentences.en: I do very much appreciate the quietness and privacy here.
sentences.cn: 我的确非常喜欢这里宁静幽雅、不受打扰的氛围。

sentences.en: I’d appreciate it if you let me get on with my job.
sentences.cn: 如果你能让我继续工作，我会非常感激。

sentences.en: I'd appreciate some feedback on my work.
sentences.cn: 如果有人对我的工作提出意见我将感激不尽。

sentences.en: I’m not an expert, but I appreciate fine works of art.
sentences.cn: 文例句：我不是专家，但我欣赏优秀的艺术作品。

sentences.en: In time you'll appreciate the beauty and subtlety of this language.
sentences.cn: 总有一天你会体会到这门语言的优美和微妙之处。

sentences.en: It is easy to appreciate the craftsmanship of Armani.
sentences.cn: 阿玛尼的精致工艺很容易博得人们的赞誉。

sentences.en: Most investments are expected to appreciate at a steady rate.
sentences.cn: 大多数投资都应该会平稳增值。

sentences.en: Only inside do you appreciate the church's true grandeur.
sentences.cn: 只有深入其中，你才能真正欣赏教堂的富丽堂皇。

sentences.en: Only now have doctors, and allied medical professionals, come to appreciate this.
sentences.cn: 直到现在医生和相关医学人士才开始对此有所认识。

sentences.en: Perhaps, when you've heard me out, you'll appreciate the reason for secrecy.
sentences.cn: 也许当你听我把话讲完后，你就会明白为什么要保密了。

sentences.en: Thanks ever so much for your help, I really appreciate it.
sentences.cn: 多谢你的帮助，我真的很感激。

sentences.en: Thanks, lads. I appreciate it.
sentences.cn: 谢了，哥们儿。我很感激。

sentences.en: The happiest are not those who own all the best things, but those who can appreciate the beauty of life.
sentences.cn: 最幸福的人们并不一定什么都是最好，只是他们懂得欣赏生活的美好。

sentences.en: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality .
sentences.cn: 很难从全局上理解局势的严重性。

sentences.en: They appreciate all the creature comforts of home.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢家里的舒适环境。

sentences.en: They don't have any confidence that houses will appreciate in value.
sentences.cn: 他们完全不相信房子会升值。

sentences.en: We appreciate that caring for children is an important job.
sentences.cn: 我们理解，照顾小孩子是个重要的工作。

sentences.en: You can't really appreciate foreign literature in translation.
sentences.cn: 看翻译作品不能真正欣赏到外国文学原著的美妙之处。

words.tran_cn: 感激的；赏识的；有欣赏力的；承认有价值的

trans.tran_cn: 欣赏，重视，感激，欢迎，理解，领会，升值
trans.tran_en: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done
to gradually become more valuable over a period of time

trans.tran_cn: 重视；为…表示感激；意识到
trans.tran_en: used to thank someone in a polite way or to say that you are grateful for something they have done
